full_summary:
roadom parts delivery for installation on antennas
**Government Tender Announcement**
#PW_22_01012227
##Tender Title
###Parts needed for radome installation on antennas
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Publication Date:** 2022-11-02
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-05 14:00:00 EST
**Tender Status:** Expired

**Procurement Category:** Services Related to Military or Defense Operations
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Regions of Opportunity:** Canada, Worldwide Delivery
**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence

**Tender Description:**
A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued by the Department of National Defence for the delivery of radome parts required for installation on antennas.
The scope of work includes:
* One (1) Zenith hatch with vent and cover assembly
* Two sets of exterior anchor points
* ACWL panel modification to mount ACWL-C4 composite ACWL with lightning rod and maintenance pulley assembly
* Base panels with base vent assembly
The parts are to be delivered to Barrington, Nova Scotia, and one main panel to Holberg, British Columbia.

**Important Documents:**
Please note that documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

* [Amendment 1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/04/aab04ff51af282512f83559d7b1a1f31/amdt_1_w8485-237414.pdf)
* [RFP](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/02/e943118424c22ba3ad32370d2e7e8a8e/w8485-237414_rfp_.pdf)
* [Amendment 2](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/21/f9d05ee295bd5b95eb7e4fccc71eaf19/amdt_2_w8485-237414.pdf)
